name: CUSTOM Image With Text #12
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign slide_gap_mobile = section.settings.slide_gap_mobile
  assign slide_gap = section.settings.slide_gap

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = section.settings.content_horizontal_align_mobile
  assign content_horizontal_align = section.settings.content_horizontal_align
  assign content_mt = section.settings.content_mt

  assign text_align = ""
  if content_horizontal_align == "start"
    assign text_align = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align == "center"
    assign text_align = "center"
  else
    assign text_align = "right"
  endif

  assign text_align_mobile = ""
  if content_horizontal_align_mobile == "start"
    assign text_align_mobile = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align_mobile == "center"
    assign text_align_mobile = "center"
  else
    assign text_align_mobile = "right"
  endif

  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height

  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt

  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_style = section.settings.button_style

  assign images_position_mobile = section.settings.images_position_mobile
  assign images_position = section.settings.images_position
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_shape = section.settings.image_shape
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius

  assign dots_bg_color = section.settings.dots_bg_color
  assign dots_bg_hover_color = section.settings.dots_bg_hover_color
  assign dots_border_color = section.settings.dots_border_color
  assign dots_border_hover_color = section.settings.dots_border_hover_color

  assign number_size = section.settings.number_size
  assign number_size_mobile = section.settings.number_size_mobile
  assign number_color = section.settings.number_color
  assign number_custom = section.settings.number_custom
  assign number_font = section.settings.number_font
  assign number_hover_color = section.settings.number_hover_color

  assign pagination_text = section.settings.pagination_text
  assign pagination_text_size = section.settings.pagination_text_size
  assign pagination_text_size_mobile = section.settings.pagination_text_size_mobile
  assign pagination_text_color = section.settings.pagination_text_color
  assign pagination_text_custom = section.settings.pagination_text_custom
  assign pagination_text_height = section.settings.pagination_text_height
  assign pagination_text_font = section.settings.pagination_text_font

-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  number_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  pagination_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .image-text-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
  }

  .image-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: {{ slide_gap_mobile }}px;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .image-text-content-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .image-text-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .image-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .image-text-text-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin-top: {{ text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .image-text-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: relative;
    font-weight: 700;
    z-index: 2;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }

  .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .image-text-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .image-text-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .clip-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    pointer-events: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0%;
    bottom: 0%;
    left: 0%;
    right: 0%;
    background-color: transparent !important;
  }

  .image-text-pagination-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .image-text-pagination-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    font-size: {{ pagination_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ pagination_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ pagination_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    position: static !important;
    display: flex !important;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }} !important;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center !important;
    justify-content: center !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    width: 32px !important;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    height: 32px !important; 
    border-radius: 50%  !important;
    background-color: transparent !important;
    background-color: {{ dots_bg_color }} !important;
    border: 1px solid {{ dots_border_color }} !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    color: {{ number_color }};
    font-size: {{ number_size_mobile }}px;
    opacity: 1 !important;
    margin: 0px !important;
  }

  .image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet:hover {
    background-color: {{ dots_bg_hover_color }} !important;
    border: 1px solid {{ dots_border_hover_color }} !important;
    color: {{ number_hover_color }} !important;
    transform: scale(0.95);
  }

  .image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    background-color: {{ dots_bg_hover_color }} !important;
    border: 1px solid {{ dots_border_hover_color }} !important;
    color: {{ number_hover_color }} !important;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .image-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ slide_gap }}px;
      align-items: center;
    }

    .image-text-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin: 0px;
      padding-top: calc(10% + {{ content_mt }}px);
      max-width: 50%;
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .image-text-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
    }
    
    .image-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .image-text-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
    }

    .image-text-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      max-width: fit-content;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
    }

    .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 50%;
    }

    .image-text-pagination-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      margin: 0px;
      position: absolute !important;
      bottom: unset !important;
      top: 5% !important;
      z-index: 2;
      max-width: calc(50% - {{ slide_gap | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}px);
    }

    .image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }} !important;
    } 

    .image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      font-size: {{ number_size }}px;
    }

    .image-text-pagination-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
      font-size: {{ pagination_text_size }}px;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1200px) {
      .image-text-content-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-top: calc(5% + {{ content_mt }}px);
      }
    }

    @media(min-width: 1500px) {
      .image-text-content-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-top: {{ content_mt }}px;
      }
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .image-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .image-text-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_custom %}
  <style>
    .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_font.family }}, {{ button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if number_custom %}
  <style>
    .image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      font-family: {{ number_font.family }}, {{ number_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ number_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ number_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .image-text-pagination-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ pagination_text_font.family }}, {{ pagination_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ pagination_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ pagination_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_align_mobile == "center" %}
  <style>
   .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% elsif text_align_mobile == "right" %}
  <style>
   .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_align == "center" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto !important;
        margin-right: auto !important;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif text_align == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto !important;
        margin-right: 0px !important;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0px !important;
        margin-right: 0px !important;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_style == "non_outline" or button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
    }

    .image-text-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif button_style == "outline" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
      border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    }

    .image-text-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
      border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif button_style == "link" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-button-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px !important;
      max-width: fit-content !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if images_position_mobile == "top" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: column-reverse;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .image-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if images_position == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .image-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .image-text-slide-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
      }

      .image-text-pagination-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        left: unset !important;
        right: 0 !important;
      }

    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-image-{{ section.id }}{
     aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: auto; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_shape == "none" %}
  <style>
    .image-text-image-{{ section.id }} {
      border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
      border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} image-text-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
        <div class="image-text-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
          <div class="image-text-pagination-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
            {% if pagination_text != blank %}
              <p class="image-text-pagination-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ pagination_text }}</p>
            {% endif %}
            {% if section.blocks.size > 1 %}
              <div class="image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              <div class="image-text-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                <div class="image-text-content-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                    <div class="image-text-heading-{{ section.id }}">
                      {{ block.settings.heading  }}
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}

                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <div class="image-text-text-{{ section.id }}">
                      {{ block.settings.text  }}
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}

                  {% if block.settings.button != blank %}
                    <a href="{{ block.settings.button_url }}" class="image-text-button-{{ section.id }}">
                      <span>{{ block.settings.button }}</span>
                      {% if button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                        <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

          </div>

    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initImageText12() {
    const slider = new Swiper(".image-text-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      loop: true,
      effect: "fade",
      fadeEffect: { crossFade: true },
      slidesPerView: 1,
      {% if section.blocks.size > 1 %}
      pagination: {
        el: '.image-text-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        clickable: true,
        renderBullet: function (index, className) {
           return '<span class="' + className + '">' + (index + 1) + "</span>";
         },
      }
      {% endif %}
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initImageText12);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initImageText12);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initImageText12);
  }
</script>

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
